00028 /*
00029  * This file is part of Lustre, http://www.lustre.org/
00030  *
00031  * Author: Nathan Rutman <nathan.rutman@sun.com>
00032  *
00033  * Kernel <-> userspace communication routines.
00034  * Using pipes for all arches.
00035  */
00036 
00037 #define DEBUG_SUBSYSTEM S_CLASS
00038 #define D_KUC D_OTHER
00039 
00040 #include <obd_support.h>
00041 #include <lustre_kernelcomm.h>
00042 
00043 /* write a userspace buffer to disk.
00044  * NOTE: this returns 0 on success, not the number of bytes written. */
00045 static ssize_t
00046 filp_user_write(struct file *filp, const void *buf, size_t count,
00047                 loff_t *offset)
00048 {
00049         mm_segment_t fs;
00050         ssize_t size = 0;
00051 
00052         fs = get_fs();
00053         set_fs(KERNEL_DS);
00054         while ((ssize_t)count > 0) {
00055                 size = vfs_write(filp, (const void __user *)buf, count, offset);
00056                 if (size < 0)
00057                         break;
00058                 count -= size;
00059                 buf += size;
00060                 size = 0;
00061         }
00062         set_fs(fs);
00063 
00064         return size;
00065 }
00066 
00073 int libcfs_kkuc_msg_put(struct file *filp, void *payload)
00074 {
00075         struct kuc_hdr *kuch = (struct kuc_hdr *)payload;
00076         int rc = -ENOSYS;
00077         loff_t offset = 0;
00078 
00079         if (filp == NULL || IS_ERR(filp))
00080                 return -EBADF;
00081 
00082         if (kuch->kuc_magic != KUC_MAGIC) {
00083                 CERROR("KernelComm: bad magic %x\n", kuch->kuc_magic);
00084                 return -ENOSYS;
00085         }
00086 
00087         rc = filp_user_write(filp, payload, kuch->kuc_msglen, &offset);
00088         if (rc < 0)
00089                 CWARN("message send failed (%d)\n", rc);
00090         else
00091                 CDEBUG(D_KUC, "Sent message rc=%d, fp=%p\n", rc, filp);
00092 
00093         return rc;
00094 }
00095 EXPORT_SYMBOL(libcfs_kkuc_msg_put);
00096 
00097 /* Broadcast groups are global across all mounted filesystems;
00098  * i.e. registering for a group on 1 fs will get messages for that
00099  * group from any fs */
00101 struct kkuc_reg {
00102         struct list_head kr_chain;
00103         int              kr_uid;
00104         struct file     *kr_fp;
00105         char             kr_data[0];
00106 };
00107 
00108 static struct list_head kkuc_groups[KUC_GRP_MAX+1] = {};
00109 /* Protect message sending against remove and adds */
00110 static DECLARE_RWSEM(kg_sem);
00111 
00118 int libcfs_kkuc_group_add(struct file *filp, int uid, int group,
00119                           void *data, size_t data_len)
00120 {
00121         struct kkuc_reg *reg;
00122 
00123         if (group > KUC_GRP_MAX) {
00124                 CDEBUG(D_WARNING, "Kernelcomm: bad group %d\n", group);
00125                 return -EINVAL;
00126         }
00127 
00128         /* fput in group_rem */
00129         if (filp == NULL)
00130                 return -EBADF;
00131 
00132         /* freed in group_rem */
00133         reg = kmalloc(sizeof(*reg) + data_len, 0);
00134         if (reg == NULL)
00135                 return -ENOMEM;
00136 
00137         reg->kr_fp = filp;
00138         reg->kr_uid = uid;
00139         memcpy(reg->kr_data, data, data_len);
00140 
00141         down_write(&kg_sem);
00142         if (kkuc_groups[group].next == NULL)
00143                 INIT_LIST_HEAD(&kkuc_groups[group]);
00144         list_add(&reg->kr_chain, &kkuc_groups[group]);
00145         up_write(&kg_sem);
00146 
00147         CDEBUG(D_KUC, "Added uid=%d fp=%p to group %d\n", uid, filp, group);
00148 
00149         return 0;
00150 }
00151 EXPORT_SYMBOL(libcfs_kkuc_group_add);
00152 
00153 int libcfs_kkuc_group_rem(int uid, int group)
00154 {
00155         struct kkuc_reg *reg, *next;
00156         ENTRY;
00157 
00158         if (kkuc_groups[group].next == NULL)
00159                 RETURN(0);
00160 
00161         if (uid == 0) {
00162                 /* Broadcast a shutdown message */
00163                 struct kuc_hdr lh;
00164 
00165                 lh.kuc_magic = KUC_MAGIC;
00166                 lh.kuc_transport = KUC_TRANSPORT_GENERIC;
00167                 lh.kuc_msgtype = KUC_MSG_SHUTDOWN;
00168                 lh.kuc_msglen = sizeof(lh);
00169                 libcfs_kkuc_group_put(group, &lh);
00170         }
00171 
00172         down_write(&kg_sem);
00173         list_for_each_entry_safe(reg, next, &kkuc_groups[group], kr_chain) {
00174                 if ((uid == 0) || (uid == reg->kr_uid)) {
00175                         list_del(&reg->kr_chain);
00176                         CDEBUG(D_KUC, "Removed uid=%d fp=%p from group %d\n",
00177                                 reg->kr_uid, reg->kr_fp, group);
00178                         if (reg->kr_fp != NULL)
00179                                 fput(reg->kr_fp);
00180                         kfree(reg);
00181                 }
00182         }
00183         up_write(&kg_sem);
00184 
00185         RETURN(0);
00186 }
00187 EXPORT_SYMBOL(libcfs_kkuc_group_rem);
00188 
00189 int libcfs_kkuc_group_put(int group, void *payload)
00190 {
00191         struct kkuc_reg *reg;
00192         int              rc = 0;
00193         int one_success = 0;
00194         ENTRY;
00195 
00196         down_write(&kg_sem);
00197         list_for_each_entry(reg, &kkuc_groups[group], kr_chain) {
00198                 if (reg->kr_fp != NULL) {
00199                         rc = libcfs_kkuc_msg_put(reg->kr_fp, payload);
00200                         if (rc == 0)
00201                                 one_success = 1;
00202                         else if (rc == -EPIPE) {
00203                                 fput(reg->kr_fp);
00204                                 reg->kr_fp = NULL;
00205                         }
00206                 }
00207         }
00208         up_write(&kg_sem);
00209 
00210         /* don't return an error if the message has been delivered
00211          * at least to one agent */
00212         if (one_success)
00213                 rc = 0;
00214 
00215         RETURN(rc);
00216 }
00217 EXPORT_SYMBOL(libcfs_kkuc_group_put);
00218 
00225 int libcfs_kkuc_group_foreach(int group, libcfs_kkuc_cb_t cb_func,
00226                               void *cb_arg)
00227 {
00228         struct kkuc_reg *reg;
00229         int              rc = 0;
00230         ENTRY;
00231 
00232         if (group > KUC_GRP_MAX) {
00233                 CDEBUG(D_WARNING, "Kernelcomm: bad group %d\n", group);
00234                 RETURN(-EINVAL);
00235         }
00236 
00237         /* no link for this group */
00238         if (kkuc_groups[group].next == NULL)
00239                 RETURN(0);
00240 
00241         down_read(&kg_sem);
00242         list_for_each_entry(reg, &kkuc_groups[group], kr_chain) {
00243                 if (reg->kr_fp != NULL)
00244                         rc = cb_func(reg->kr_data, cb_arg);
00245         }
00246         up_read(&kg_sem);
00247 
00248         RETURN(rc);
00249 }
00250 EXPORT_SYMBOL(libcfs_kkuc_group_foreach);
